'''Steven Jay Blum''' ([[28 April|April 28]], [[1965]]) is an American voice actor. His most recognized roles are that of [[wikipedia:Wolverine (comics)|Wolverine]], and [[wikipedia:Spike Spiegel|Spike Spiegel]] in ''[[wikipedia:Cowboy Bebop|Cowboy Bebop]]''. He is currently married to [[Mary Elizabeth McGlynn]],who is also a voice actress.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://liverampup.com/entertainment/steve-blum-voice-actor-wife-net-worth.html|articlename=
Voice Actor Steve Blum Wife, Says He'd Take A Bullet For Her - Literally!|dated=27 December 2018|website=[https://liverampup.com LiveRampup]|accessed=27 December 2021}}</ref>

==Roles==
* [[2014]]: ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor ]]'': [[Sauron]]
* [[2011]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'': Unspecified
* [[2010]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'': Unspecified
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': Unspecified
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'': [[Varin]], Gondor Swordsman, Dwarf Shieldbreaker
